leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-谱学解析与表征生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→峰识别→指认→定量→报告

unit.unit_name: MS 鉴定/定量与库搜索

tools.name: Waters2mzML
tools.one_line_profile: Converter and annotator for Waters MSn raw data to mzML format
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to convert and annotate Waters .raw Mass Spectrometry data (both MSe and DDA) into functional .mzML files, enabling subsequent processing in tools like MZmine 3.

tools.name: medusa
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis pipeline for high-resolution mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A software package for fully automated, unconstrained analysis of high-resolution mass spectrometry data using machine learning techniques, developed by Ananikov Lab.

tools.name: Mistle
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance spectral search engine for MS2 data
tools.detailed_description: A fast spectral search engine that uses fragment-indexing techniques and SIMD intrinsics to match experimental MS2 spectra to large spectral libraries with high performance.

tools.name: AVPIden
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction scheme for antiviral peptides identification
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based prediction tool for the identification and functional characterization of antiviral peptides (AVPs) from sequence data.

tools.name: openMSE
tools.one_line_profile: Management strategy evaluation tool for fisheries
tools.detailed_description: An open-source R-based toolset for management strategy evaluation and risk assessment in fisheries science, enabling modeling of stock dynamics and harvest strategies.

tools.name: Graph2Pro
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-centric peptide identification for metaproteomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing a graph-centric approach for metagenome-guided peptide identification in metaproteomics, designed to handle complex metaproteomic data.

tools.name: CRANK-MS
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based classification and ranking for MS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Classification and Ranking Analysis using Neural networks to generate Knowledge from Mass Spectrometry data, specifically for metabolomics.

tools.name: ProPro-Server
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput DIA proteomics data analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale data-independent acquisition (DIA) proteomics data analysis system, providing workflow management and processing capabilities.

tools.name: DIALib-QC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality assessment tool for spectral assay libraries
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the systematic evaluation and quality control of spectral assay libraries used in Data Independent Acquisition (DIA) analysis.

tools.name: pyquant
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tool for mass spectrometry quantification
tools.detailed_description: A platform-independent command line tool for the analysis and quantification of mass spectrometry data, supporting various formats.

tools.name: MetaboDirect
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for direct injection FT-ICR MS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive command-line pipeline designed for the analysis of direct injection Fourier Transform Ion Cyclotron Resonance (FT-ICR) mass spectrometry data, specifically for metabolomics.

tools.name: chem-spectra-app
tools.one_line_profile: Web service for NMR/IR/MS spectra processing
tools.detailed_description: A backend web service that provides processing capabilities for various chemical spectra formats including jcamp, RAW, and mzML, covering NMR, IR, and MS data.

tools.name: COSS
tools.one_line_profile: CompOmics Spectral Searching tool
tools.detailed_description: A spectral searching tool developed by CompOmics for identifying peptides from mass spectrometry data by matching against spectral libraries.

tools.name: ms2rescore
tools.one_line_profile: AI-assisted rescoring of peptide identifications
tools.detailed_description: A modular platform for AI-assisted rescoring of peptide identifications from mass spectrometry data, improving identification rates and confidence.

tools.name: PeptideShaker
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretation and visualization of proteomics identification results
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the interpretation, validation, and visualization of proteomics identification results from multiple search engines.

tools.name: psm_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for handling peptide-spectrum matches
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing common utilities for parsing, handling, and manipulating peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs) and search engine results.

tools.name: SearchGUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical interface for proteomics search engines
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly graphical interface that manages and executes multiple proteomics search engines and de novo sequencing algorithms simultaneously.

tools.name: PeakDecoder
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolite identification workflow for LC-IM-MS-DIA
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for metabolite identification and accurate profiling in multidimensional LC-IM-MS-DIA (Liquid Chromatography-Ion Mobility-Mass Spectrometry-Data Independent Acquisition) measurements.

tools.name: maxquant-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline wrapper for MaxQuant
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline wrapper for MaxQuant, facilitating the processing of proteomics data through the MaxQuant software suite.

tools.name: Protein-Contaminant-Libraries
tools.one_line_profile: Contaminant protein libraries for DDA and DIA proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of contaminant protein FASTA and spectral libraries designed to be universally applied to DDA and DIA proteomics workflows for filtering and identification.

tools.name: Risa
tools.one_line_profile: R package for parsing ISA-tab metadata and integrating with Bioconductor structures
tools.detailed_description: Risa allows access to metadata and data in ISA-tab format and builds Bioconductor data structures. It processes metadata associated with proteomics and metabolomics-based assays into xcmsSet objects for downstream analysis.

tools.name: deepAMPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for identification of antimicrobial peptides
tools.detailed_description: The implementation of deepAMPNet, a deep learning approach for the identification of antimicrobial peptides (AMPs).

tools.name: antifungal
tools.one_line_profile: Backend for antifungipept platform for antifungal peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: The backend code for antifungipept, an online platform designed for the identification, activity prediction, and rational design of antifungal peptides (AFPs).

tools.name: dia_pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Difference Image Analysis pipeline for LSST data
tools.detailed_description: A Difference Image Analysis (DIA) pipeline built using LSST DM Science Pipelines, developed for DESC Data Challenges to analyze astronomical image differences.

tools.name: LargeMetabo
tools.one_line_profile: R package for large-scale metabolomics data integration and analysis
tools.detailed_description: LargeMetabo is an R package designed for data integration, biomarker identification, metabolite annotation, and enrichment analysis in large-scale metabolomics studies.

tools.name: LipidIN
tools.one_line_profile: Platform-independent annotation and reverse lipidomics tool
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository and tool for flash platform-independent annotation and reverse lipidomics analysis.

tools.name: Untargeted_metabolomics_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for untargeted metabolomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative workflow for untargeted metabolomics data processing and analysis using open-source tools.

tools.name: snakemake-ms-proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for MS proteomics processing and QC
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for automatic processing and quality control of mass spectrometry proteomics data using Snakemake.

tools.name: MS-GF+
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide identification tool scoring MS/MS spectra against protein databases
tools.detailed_description: MS-GF+ (aka MSGF+ or MSGFPlus) performs peptide identification by scoring MS/MS spectra against peptides derived from a protein sequence database.

tools.name: alphakraken
tools.one_line_profile: Automated data processing system for mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated data processing and analysis system for mass spectrometry experiments.

tools.name: alphapeptstats
tools.one_line_profile: Downstream analysis library for proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: Python Package for the downstream analysis of mass-spectrometry-based proteomics data.

tools.name: alphapepttools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for biological interpretation of proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: Search- and quantification-engine agnostic biological interpretation of proteomics data.

tools.name: directlfq
tools.one_line_profile: Label-free quantification for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: Fast and accurate label-free quantification for small and very large numbers of proteomes.

tools.name: AMP-potency-prediction-EvoGradient
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for AMP identification and virtual evolution
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of 'Automatic Identification and Virtual Directed Evolution of Antimicrobial Peptides with Explainable Deep Learning'.

tools.name: FragPipe-Analyst
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for FragPipe data analysis (Monash mirror/source)
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing the source code or documentation for FragPipe-Analyst, an interactive web application for analyzing FragPipe results.

tools.name: FragPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform proteomics data analysis suite
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform proteomics data analysis suite that integrates MSFragger, IonQuant, and other tools for comprehensive proteomics workflows.

tools.name: FragPipe-Analyst
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web application for FragPipe
tools.detailed_description: An easy-to-use and interactive web application for downstream analysis and visualization of FragPipe results.

tools.name: IonQuant
tools.one_line_profile: Label-free quantification tool for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A label-free quantification tool designed for mass spectrometry-based proteomics, often used within the FragPipe suite.

tools.name: MSFragger
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast peptide identification tool
tools.detailed_description: Ultrafast, comprehensive peptide identification tool for mass spectrometry–based proteomics, capable of open search and closed search.

tools.name: diaTracer
tools.one_line_profile: diaPASEF spectrum-centric analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for spectrum-centric analysis of diaPASEF data in mass spectrometry.

tools.name: DbDiagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Database profiling and diagnostics tool for OHDSI
tools.detailed_description: Package to profile a database and execute data diagnostics based on individual analysis settings, used in observational health data sciences.

tools.name: DIANE
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for Inference and Analysis of Networks from Expression data
tools.detailed_description: A dashboard application for the inference and analysis of biological networks from expression data.

tools.name: OpenMS
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for mass spectrometry data analysis
tools.detailed_description: The codebase of the OpenMS project, a comprehensive C++ library and set of tools for mass spectrometry and proteomics data analysis.

tools.name: OrgMassSpecR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for organic/biological mass spectrometry analysis
tools.detailed_description: R package for organic and biological mass spectrometry data analysis and visualization.

tools.name: deeprtalign
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based retention time alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based retention time alignment tool for large cohort LC-MS data analysis.

tools.name: Informed-Proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Top-down/bottom-up MS/MS analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Top down and bottom up MS/MS analysis for DDA and DIA mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: LCMS-Spectator
tools.one_line_profile: Viewer for LCMS raw data and MS-GF+ results
tools.detailed_description: A viewer application for LCMS raw data and MS-GF+ identification results.

tools.name: Mzid-To-Tsv-Converter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for mzIdentML to TSV
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert mzIdentML files created by MS-GF+ to tab-delimited text files.

tools.name: OpenMSC
tools.one_line_profile: Open Multi Sensor Calibration Software
tools.detailed_description: An Open Multi Sensor Calibration Software for calibrating various sensors, applicable in scientific and engineering contexts.

tools.name: pwiz
tools.one_line_profile: ProteoWizard library for MS data analysis and conversion
tools.detailed_description: The ProteoWizard Library is a set of software libraries and tools (including msconvert) for rapid development of mass spectrometry and proteomic data analysis software.

tools.name: aSPIRE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for peptide abundance processing using label-free quantification
tools.detailed_description: aSPIRE is a tool for the processing of peptide abundances using label-free quantification mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: invitroSPI
tools.one_line_profile: Spliced peptide identification tool
tools.detailed_description: Tool for spliced peptide identification from in vitro digestions of polypeptides with purified proteasomes.

tools.name: Anticancer-Peptides-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-CNN model for anticancer peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: Anticancer Peptide Identification employing Multi-headed Deep-CNN.

tools.name: Diffusion Deconvolution DIA-MS/MS
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model-based deconvolution tool for DIA-MS/MS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool that applies diffusion models to deconvolute highly multiplexed DIA-MS/MS data by conditioning on MS1 signals to generate cleaner MS2 data for downstream analysis.

tools.name: DART-ID
tools.one_line_profile: Retention time alignment and peptide identification confidence updates
tools.detailed_description: A tool for retention time alignment and peptide identification confidence updates in LC-MS/MS proteomics data analysis.

tools.name: limpa
tools.one_line_profile: Quantification and differential analysis of MS proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for quantification and differential analysis of mass-spectrometry proteomics data, incorporating probabilistic recovery of information from missing values.

tools.name: LipidLynxX
tools.one_line_profile: Lipid annotation converter and cross-matcher
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert, cross-match, and link various lipid annotations to support lipid ontology, pathway, and network analysis for systems-wide integration.

tools.name: LipidHunter
tools.one_line_profile: Bottom-up identification of lipids from LC-MS/MS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool capable of performing bottom-up identification of lipids from LC-MS/MS and shotgun lipidomics data, resembling a manual spectra annotation workflow.

tools.name: MALDIpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for single-cell analysis of imaging mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the single-cell analysis of imaging mass spectrometry (IMS) data.

tools.name: Comet
tools.one_line_profile: Tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) sequence database search engine
tools.detailed_description: A tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) sequence database search tool for peptide identification.

tools.name: MSstatsPTM
tools.one_line_profile: PTM significance analysis in shotgun proteomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Post Translational Modification (PTM) significance analysis in shotgun mass spectrometry-based proteomic experiments.

tools.name: compMS2Miner
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolite identification R-package for LC-MS datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R-package for metabolite identification in metabolomic high-resolution LC-MS datasets.

tools.name: Biotransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction and identification of metabolites
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for the prediction and identification of small molecule metabolites and biotransformations.

tools.name: EntropySearch
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral library search with entropy similarity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for searching mass spectral libraries using entropy similarity algorithms.

tools.name: npdtools
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Product Discovery toolkit for MS data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing various pipelines for in silico analysis of natural product mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: Param-Medic
tools.one_line_profile: Automated optimization of MS/MS database search parameters
tools.detailed_description: Param-Medic is a tool that optimizes MS/MS database search parameters by analyzing the input data itself, breathing new life into database searches by tailoring settings to the specific dataset.

tools.name: PIPI
tools.one_line_profile: PTM-Invariant Peptide Identification tool for open search
tools.detailed_description: PIPI (PTM-Invariant Peptide Identification) is a tool designed for the identification of peptides with post-translational modifications (PTMs) using an open search approach in mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: FERMO
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for analysis of LC-MS/MS metabolomics data
tools.detailed_description: FERMO is a dashboard designed for the processing and analysis of liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) data, specifically facilitating the analysis of complex metabolomics datasets.

tools.name: MSL-ST
tools.one_line_profile: Mass spectral libraries search tool for organic compound identification
tools.detailed_description: Mass spectral libraries search tool (MSL-ST) is used to enhance the identification of organic compounds by searching against mass spectral libraries.

tools.name: glyXtoolMS
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automated analysis of glycopeptide mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: glyXtoolMS is an open-source software tool designed for the semi-automated analysis of glycopeptide data derived from mass spectrometry experiments.

tools.name: DIA-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained model for DIA mass spectrometry proteomics data analysis
tools.detailed_description: DIA-BERT is a pre-trained BERT-based model specifically designed for the analysis of proteomics data generated via Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry.

tools.name: HaDeX
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualisation of HDX-MS data
tools.detailed_description: HaDeX is a tool for the analysis and visualization of Hydrogen/Deuterium Exchange Mass Spectrometry (HDX-MS) data, aiding in the study of protein dynamics and interactions.

tools.name: MS Annika
tools.one_line_profile: Crosslink search engine for MS2 and MS3 spectra
tools.detailed_description: MS Annika is a crosslink search engine based on MS Amanda, designed to identify crosslinks of cleavable and non-cleavable crosslinkers from MS2 and MS3 mass spectrometry spectra.

tools.name: HiCOPS
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated database search for peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: HiCOPS is a computational framework for peptide identification from mass spectrometry data, featuring an accelerated database search mechanism.

tools.name: IDSL.UFA
tools.one_line_profile: United Formula Annotation for LC-HRMS data
tools.detailed_description: IDSL.UFA is a tool for United Formula Annotation (UFA) designed for processing and annotating Liquid Chromatography High-Resolution Mass Spectrometry (LC-HRMS) data.

tools.name: InstaNovo
tools.one_line_profile: De novo peptide sequencing tool
tools.detailed_description: InstaNovo performs de novo peptide sequencing, enabling accurate, database-free peptide identification for large-scale proteomics experiments.

tools.name: MS2Query
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning assisted library querying of MS/MS spectra
tools.detailed_description: MS2Query uses machine learning to assist in library querying of MS/MS spectra, improving the identification of molecules in mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: MetFamily
tools.one_line_profile: Untargeted discovery of metabolite families in metabolomics
tools.detailed_description: MetFamily is a web application and methodology for the untargeted discovery of metabolite families, offering a bird's eye view of metabolic regulation in comparative metabolomics studies.

tools.name: lc-ms-d3js
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization of Mass Spectrum using d3js
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Tandem Mass Spectrometry Analysis and visualization, providing an interactive mass spectrum graph over the web using d3js.

tools.name: olssen
tools.one_line_profile: OnLine Spectral Search ENgine for Proteomics big data
tools.detailed_description: OLSSEN (OnLine Spectral Search ENgine) is designed for processing Proteomics big data using Apache Spark, Python/Flask, and AngularJS.

tools.name: SlicerMassVision
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer module for mass spectrometry imaging analysis
tools.detailed_description: SlicerMassVision is a module for 3D Slicer that enables end-to-end analysis of mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data.

tools.name: metID
tools.one_line_profile: Database construction and metabolite identification
tools.detailed_description: metID is an R package used to construct databases and identify metabolites from mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: iDOM
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis of dissolved organic matter from HRMS data
tools.detailed_description: iDOM provides tools for the statistical analysis of dissolved organic matter (DOM) based on high-resolution mass spectrometry (HRMS) data.

tools.name: xcms-gnps-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for integrating XCMS with GNPS molecular networking
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R utility functions designed to facilitate the workflow between XCMS (LC-MS data preprocessing) and GNPS (Global Natural Products Social Molecular Networking), specifically for feature-based molecular networking.

tools.name: xcms4gnps2
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing workflow for LC-MS/MS data for GNPS2 analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool based on XCMS for preprocessing LC-MS/MS data to enable Feature-Based Molecular Networking (FBMN) on the GNPS2 platform.

tools.name: PepTrust
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic framework for high-confidence peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic framework designed to improve the confidence of peptide identification in proteomics by leveraging semi-supervised learning and decoy fusion strategies.

tools.name: deep_metab
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning methods for metabolite identification in LC-MS
tools.detailed_description: A research implementation applying deep learning techniques to Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS) metabolomics data to enhance metabolite identification accuracy.

tools.name: mass2adduct
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of matrix-metabolite adducts in MALDI-MSI
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the analysis and identification of matrix-metabolite adducts in MALDI mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) datasets, helping to distinguish biological signals from matrix artifacts.

tools.name: UltraQuant
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable MaxQuant workflow with Snakemake and Singularity
tools.detailed_description: A workflow wrapper that containerizes MaxQuant using Singularity and orchestrates execution with Snakemake, enabling scalable and reproducible mass spectrometry data analysis on Linux computing clusters.

tools.name: BoltzMatch
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning scoring for peptide-spectrum matching
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning-based scoring method for peptide-spectrum matching (PSM) in tandem mass spectrometry shotgun proteomics, designed to improve identification accuracy.

tools.name: MS_targeted
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for statistical analysis of targeted MS metabolomics
tools.detailed_description: An open-source command-line pipeline designed for the statistical analysis and processing of targeted mass spectrometry metabolomics data.

tools.name: cpc
tools.one_line_profile: Characterization of peaks detected by XCMS
tools.detailed_description: A tool for characterizing peaks detected in mass spectrometry data, specifically designed to work with preprocessing results from XCMS.

tools.name: iACVP
tools.one_line_profile: Computational identification of anti-coronavirus peptides
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for the identification and prediction of anti-coronavirus peptides using sequence-based features and machine learning.

tools.name: OpenMS (LANL)
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale solvers for coupled Maxwell-Schrödinger equations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of multiscale solvers developed by Los Alamos National Laboratory for simulating coupled Maxwell-Schrödinger equations in open quantum environments. (Note: Distinct from the OpenMS proteomics framework).

tools.name: Sage
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance proteomics search and quantification engine
tools.detailed_description: An extremely fast, open-source proteomics search engine and quantification tool written in Rust, supporting isobaric labeling, label-free quantification, and various mass spectrometry workflows.

tools.name: DeepDIA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for in silico spectral library generation in DIA
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating in silico spectral libraries to support Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry analysis, improving peptide identification without experimental libraries.

tools.name: ProteoLizard-AlgorithmToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms for processing ion-mobility mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing advanced machine learning algorithms for the efficient processing of ion-mobility mass spectrometry (IMS-MS) raw data, leveraging GPU acceleration.

tools.name: ORIGAMI
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis suite for activated ion mobility mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: A software suite designed for the analysis and visualization of activated ion mobility mass spectrometry (IM-MS) data, supporting collision cross-section (CCS) calculations and unfolding plots.

tools.name: PEAKS Online
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed platform for DDA/DIA proteomics identification
tools.detailed_description: A distributed computing platform designed for high-throughput, parallel protein and peptide identification from DDA and DIA mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: M²aia
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis of mass spectrometry imaging in MITK
tools.detailed_description: An application for the interactive analysis and visualization of Mass Spectrometry Imaging (MSI) data, integrated into the Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit (MITK).

tools.name: MSblender
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical tool for merging proteomics search engine results
tools.detailed_description: A statistical tool that merges database search results from multiple proteomics search engines to improve peptide identification accuracy using a multivariate modeling approach.

tools.name: matchms
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for processing and comparing mass spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing tandem mass spectrometry data and computing spectral similarities, facilitating mass spectral networking and library matching.

tools.name: openmpp
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to OpenM++ microsimulation platform
tools.detailed_description: A programmatic R interface to the OpenM++ microsimulation platform, allowing researchers to run, analyze, and manage scientific microsimulation models.

tools.name: masserstein
tools.one_line_profile: MS analysis using Wasserstein metric
tools.detailed_description: Tools for the analysis of Mass Spectrometry data utilizing the Wasserstein metric (Earth Mover's Distance) for spectral comparison and processing.

tools.name: dripToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Bayesian network for peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: The DRIP Toolkit (DTK) utilizes Dynamic Bayesian Networks (DBN) for the rapid and accurate identification of peptides from tandem mass spectra.

tools.name: OpenMSFTL
tools.one_line_profile: Research simulation toolkit for federated learning
tools.detailed_description: A research simulation toolkit developed by Microsoft for experimenting with and evaluating federated learning algorithms and systems.

tools.name: ephemeris
tools.one_line_profile: Astronomical ephemeris calculations library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript implementation for calculating the ephemeris (positions) of the sun, planets, comets, asteroids, and stars, useful for astronomical data processing.

tools.name: openpi-comet
tools.one_line_profile: Codebase for BEHAVIOR Challenge (Embodied AI)
tools.detailed_description: The codebase for Team Comet's submission to the 2025 BEHAVIOR Challenge, containing algorithms and models for embodied AI and robotic manipulation tasks.

tools.name: ramanbiolib
tools.one_line_profile: Raman spectral search library for biological molecules
tools.detailed_description: A library for searching and identifying biological molecules (lipids, proteins, metabolites, etc.) using Raman spectroscopy data against a database of components.

tools.name: mzmine
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software for mass spectrometry data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive, open-source software framework for the processing, visualization, and analysis of mass spectrometry-based molecular profile data.

tools.name: MZmine 2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software for mass-spectrometry data processing
tools.detailed_description: MZmine 2 is a framework for differential analysis of mass spectrometry data. It provides a set of modules for peak picking, chromatogram building, alignment, and identification of metabolites and peptides.

tools.name: nf-core/diaproteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for quantitative analysis of DIA proteomics MS data
tools.detailed_description: An automated Nextflow pipeline for the quantitative analysis of Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics mass spectrometry measurements, handling spectral library generation and targeted extraction.

tools.name: nf-core/metaboigniter
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MS-based metabolomics data pre-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for pre-processing of mass spectrometry-based metabolomics data, performing quantification and identification based on MS1 and MS2 data using various tools.

tools.name: nf-core/mhcquant
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MHC eluted peptide identification and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for identifying and quantifying MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data, specifically designed for immunopeptidomics.

tools.name: nf-core/proteomicslfq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for label-free quantification (LFQ) proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis of proteomics data, converting raw files to quantified protein lists.

tools.name: CycloBranch
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for de novo sequencing of cyclic and branched peptides
tools.detailed_description: CycloBranch is a tool dedicated to the de novo sequencing of non-ribosomal peptides (NRPs) and other cyclic and branched peptides from mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: hdxstats
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis of HDX-MS data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the statistical analysis of hydrogen deuterium exchange mass-spectrometry (HDX-MS) data, providing methods to identify significant changes in deuterium uptake.

tools.name: OpenM++
tools.one_line_profile: Open source microsimulation platform
tools.detailed_description: OpenM++ is an open-source microsimulation platform inspired by Modgen. It provides a compiler and runtime for developing and running microsimulation models.

tools.name: OpenMSIStream
tools.one_line_profile: Materials data streaming for laboratory environments
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for streaming materials science data using Apache Kafka, designed to facilitate data transfer and processing in laboratory environments.

tools.name: pGlyco2
tools.one_line_profile: Intact glycopeptide/glycoprotein analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: pGlyco is a software tool dedicated to the analysis of intact glycopeptides and glycoproteins using mass spectrometry data, enabling precise identification of glycan structures and peptide backbones.

tools.name: pLink2
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-linked protein analysis software
tools.detailed_description: pLink is a software dedicated to the analysis of chemically cross-linked proteins or protein complexes using mass spectrometry, supporting various cross-linkers.

tools.name: Percolator
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: Percolator is a software for post-processing of shotgun proteomics data. It uses semi-supervised machine learning (SVM) to improve the discrimination between correct and incorrect peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs).

tools.name: pmartR
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control and statistics for MS omics data
tools.detailed_description: The pmartR package provides functionality for quality control, normalization, exploratory data analysis, and statistical analysis of mass spectrometry omics data (proteomics, lipidomics, metabolomics).

tools.name: climate_diagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Climate data analysis and visualization package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing and visualizing climate data from NetCDF files, focusing on time series, trend analysis, and spatial pattern visualization.

tools.name: Katamari
tools.one_line_profile: Mass spectrometry proteomics analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A mass spectrometry proteomics analysis pipeline based on KatamariDotei, designed for processing proteomics data.

tools.name: proteoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for peptide identification
tools.detailed_description: A library utilizing deep learning and ultrafast machine learning techniques for peptide identification in shotgun proteomics data.

tools.name: mqrun
tools.one_line_profile: Automation wrapper for MaxQuant
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automate the execution of MaxQuant, a popular software for quantitative proteomics, facilitating its integration into workflows.

tools.name: patRoon
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for MS-based non-target analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software platform for mass-spectrometry based non-target analysis (NTA) of metabolomics and environmental samples, providing a unified interface for various processing tools.

tools.name: IPO
tools.one_line_profile: Automated optimization of XCMS parameters
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated optimization of XCMS parameters (Isotopologue Parameter Optimization), improving the reliability of metabolomics data processing.

tools.name: Specter
tools.one_line_profile: Linear deconvolution for DIA proteomics
tools.detailed_description: Specter is a tool for the targeted analysis of data-independent acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry proteomics data using linear deconvolution.

tools.name: lipyd
tools.one_line_profile: Lipidomics LC-MS/MS data analysis module
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for the analysis of lipidomics LC-MS/MS data, facilitating identification and quantification of lipids.

tools.name: SCPCompanion
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell proteomics analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: SCPCompanion is designed for the analysis of single-cell proteomics data acquired by mass spectrometry.

tools.name: MALDIquant
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative analysis pipeline for MALDI-TOF mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A complete analysis pipeline for matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization-time of flight (MALDI-TOF) and other mass spectrometry data. It supports baseline correction, peak detection, alignment, and visualization.

tools.name: mspypeline
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization package for MaxQuant proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to analyze and visualize mass spectrometry data, specifically tailored for processing output files from MaxQuant. It provides normalization, statistical analysis, and plotting capabilities.

tools.name: SIRIUS
tools.one_line_profile: De novo metabolite identification using tandem mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: A software framework for the discovery and identification of metabolites from tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) data. It integrates isotope pattern analysis, fragmentation tree computation, and molecular fingerprint prediction.

tools.name: sirius-libs
tools.one_line_profile: Core libraries for the SIRIUS metabolite identification framework
tools.detailed_description: The underlying Java libraries powering the SIRIUS software, providing algorithms for molecular formula identification and fragmentation tree analysis for small molecules.

tools.name: FlashLFQ
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast label-free quantification for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A fast and robust algorithm for label-free quantification (LFQ) in mass spectrometry-based proteomics. It supports identification mapping, quantification, and visualization of peptide and protein abundances.

tools.name: xcms
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for LC/MS and GC/MS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the processing and analysis of liquid chromatography (LC) and gas chromatography (GC) mass spectrometry data. It handles peak detection, retention time alignment, and identification.

tools.name: PeakABro
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive peak list annotator and browser for metabolomics
tools.detailed_description: An R-based tool for browsing and annotating peak lists from metabolomics data. It allows users to visualize extracted ion chromatograms (EICs) and verify peak picking quality.

tools.name: QC4Metabolomics
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control pipeline for metabolomics studies
tools.detailed_description: A set of R tools and scripts for assessing the quality of metabolomics data, including monitoring of internal standards and batch effects.

tools.name: SpectroPipeR
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing pipeline for Spectronaut DIA-MS data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to streamline the analysis of Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry data processed by Spectronaut, facilitating downstream statistical analysis.

tools.name: LFQb
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark tool for label-free quantification in DIA proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking label-free quantification (LFQ) methods in bottom-up proteomics, specifically focusing on DIA LC-MS data processed with DIA-NN.

tools.name: amica
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web platform for proteomics data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly, web-based platform for the interactive analysis of proteomics data, supporting differential expression analysis, visualization, and quality control.

tools.name: sagepy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the Sage proteomics search engine
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and interface for Sage, a high-performance open-source search engine for mass spectrometry proteomics, enabling integration into Python-based workflows.

tools.name: MSBrowser
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive dashboard for XCMS parameter tuning and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny dashboard designed to assist in the fine-tuning of peak picking parameters for the XCMS package. It supports interactive visualization of LC-MS and GC-MS data.

tools.name: DeMix
tools.one_line_profile: Deconvolution workflow for peptide identification in chimeric spectra
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed to improve peptide identification from mass spectrometry data by deconvoluting chimeric spectra (mixed spectra from multiple peptides).

tools.name: DIA-NN
tools.one_line_profile: Universal software for DIA proteomics data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A neural network-based software suite for the processing of Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics data. It provides high-throughput identification and quantification with high accuracy.

tools.name: DeepMass
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tools for mass spectrometry data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools leveraging modern machine learning techniques for mass spectrometry data analysis, including peptide fragmentation prediction and spectral library generation.

tools.name: MSpectraAI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for multi-tumor proteome profiling
tools.detailed_description: A software tool utilizing deep learning for the analysis and deciphering of proteome profiling data from multi-tumor mass spectrometry experiments.

tools.name: SpectrumAI
tools.one_line_profile: Automated inspection of MS2 spectra for single-substitution peptides
tools.detailed_description: An R script/tool for the automatic quality inspection of MS2 spectra corresponding to single amino acid substitution peptide identifications, helping to validate variant peptides.

tools.name: DeepMSProfiler
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based analysis tool for LC-MS data
tools.detailed_description: An innovative data analysis tool focused on liquid chromatography mass spectrometry (LC-MS) data, utilizing deep learning techniques for profiling and identification.

tools.name: xcmsrocker
tools.one_line_profile: Dockerized environment for metabolomics data analysis with XCMS
tools.detailed_description: A Rocker (Docker for R) image pre-configured with XCMS and other tools for metabolomics data analysis, ensuring reproducible research environments.

tools.name: MSBERT
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based embedding for improved MS/MS database search
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that uses BERT to create embeddings for MS/MS spectra, aiming to improve the accuracy of peptide identification in database search workflows.

tools.name: APIN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for antimicrobial peptide identification using multi-scale convolutional networks
tools.detailed_description: APIN is a deep learning-based tool designed for the identification of antimicrobial peptides (AMPs). It utilizes a multi-scale convolutional neural network architecture to extract features from peptide sequences and predict their antimicrobial activity, aiding in the discovery of new therapeutic agents.

tools.name: AMP-SEMiner
tools.one_line_profile: AI framework for antimicrobial peptide identification and structural evolution mining
tools.detailed_description: AMP-SEMiner is an integrated artificial intelligence framework designed for the simultaneous identification of antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) from small open reading frames (smORFs) and protein fragments. It incorporates structural evolution mining to analyze and discover potential AMPs.
